ground_truth: They drop onto the deck below. Meanwhile, inside the ship, tables and chairs batter swimming passengers. As the water rises, some are carried up the staircase while others are trapped against the ceiling of the room below. The ornately carved wall clock at the top of the staircase sinks beneath the churning water. As sea water pours into the openings passengers back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest, Fabrizio swims past one of the broken window suction slams against the side of the ship, but he braces himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up for a railing but slips. He turns and swims toward open water. Meanwhile, Rose drops onto a lower deck. The ship's baker helps her up. Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd. In one of the lifeboats Cal beats off panicked passengers with an oar. Several cables holding a funnel snap and flail against water like whips. Cal's eyes widen as the huge funnel tips over. Swimming in the water with several others, Fabrizio looks up as the giant funnel falls onto him. It's a wave which washes away several people. A man climbs into Cal's lifeboat but Cal pushes him back into the ocean. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the crowd which slowly funnels up another staircase. Inside people cling to columns at the top of the grand staircase. Water surges up an empty corridor, splintering furniture and knocking doors off. Some people in a lifeboat behind the Titanic row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise out of the water. Some passengers leap off from the back of Titanic which is now tilted up several stories above the ocean surface. Gripping Rose's hand, Jack leaps through the crowd. They move to a railing and watch as several passengers plunge overboard. Jack and Rose continue on, pressing passed a group of people kneeling around a priest. A few dozen people tread water near the propeller. Jack pulls up towards deck which is now slanted at a forty-five degree angle. They grab onto the railing at the exact spot they first met. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward. Kneeling people grab one of the priest's hands as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand. Beside Jack and Rose a woman hugs a young boy to her chest. Shivering, Rose clings to Jack as she looks down at the sinking ship. Her breath smokes in the cold air. Rose smiles. Jack hugs her tight and kisses her forehead. Inside a submerged portion of the ship, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier, her gauzy dress billowing in the water.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: They descend onto the platform underneath. Meanwhile, within the vessel, desks and seats pummel swimming voyagers. As the liquid ascends, some are transported up the staircase while others are ensnared against the ceiling of the chamber underneath. The ornately sculpted wall timepiece at the peak of the staircase descends beneath the turbulent liquid. As ocean liquid streams into the openings voyagers retreat into the immersing vessel. Wearing a life jacket, Fabrizio paddles past one of the fractured window suction slams against the side of the vessel, but he braces himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up for a railing but slips. He turns and swims toward open liquid. Meanwhile, Rose descends onto a lower platform. The vessel's pastry chef helps her up. Jack and Rose reunite in the throng. In one of the lifeboats Cal beats off frantic voyagers with an oar. Several cables holding a chimney snap and flail against liquid like lashes. Cal's eyes widen as the enormous chimney tips over. Swimming in the liquid with several others, Fabrizio looks up as the colossal chimney falls onto him. It's a surge which washes away several people. A man climbs into Cal's lifeboat but Cal pushes him back into the sea. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the throng which slowly channels up another staircase. Inside people cling to pillars at the pinnacle of the grand staircase. Liquid surges up an unoccupied corridor, splintering furnishings and knocking portals off. Some people in a lifeboat behind the Titanic row frantically as the vessel's immense propellers ascend out of the liquid. Some voyagers leap off from the aft of Titanic which is now inclined up several stories above the sea surface. Gripping Rose's hand, Jack leaps through the throng. They move to a railing and watch as several voyagers dive overboard. Jack and Rose continue on, pressing passed a group of people kneeling around a clergyman. A few dozen people tread liquid near the propeller. Jack pulls up towards platform which is now slanted at a forty-five degree angle. They grab onto the railing at the exact spot they first encountered. Liquid streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward. Kneeling people seize one of the clergyman's hands as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand. Beside Jack and Rose a woman embraces a young boy to her chest. Shivering, Rose clings to Jack as she gazes down at the immersing vessel. Her breath smokes in the frigid air. Rose smiles. Jack embraces her tight and kisses her forehead. Inside a submerged section of the vessel, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier, her gauzy dress billowing in the liquid.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Onto the deck below, they are dropped. Meanwhile, inside the ship, swimming passengers are battered by tables and chairs. As the water rises, the staircase carries some up while the ceiling of the room below traps others. The churning water is sunk beneath by the ornately carved wall clock at the top of the staircase. As sea water pours into the openings, passengers back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest, Fabrizio is slammed by suction against the side of the ship, but he braces himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up for a railing but slips. Open water is swum toward by him. Meanwhile, onto a lower deck, Rose is dropped. She is helped up by the ship's baker. In the crowd, Jack and Rose reunite. In one of the lifeboats, panicked passengers are beaten off by Cal with an oar. Cables holding a funnel snap and flail against water like whips. As the huge funnel tips over, Cal's eyes widen. In the water with several others, Fabrizio looks up as he is fallen onto by the giant funnel. Several people are washed away by a wave. Into Cal's lifeboat, a man climbs but is pushed back into the ocean by Cal. Through the crowd which is slowly funneled up another staircase, Jack and Rose continue to fight their way. Inside, columns at the top of the grand staircase are clung to by people. Up an empty corridor, water surges, splintering furniture and knocking doors off. In a lifeboat behind the Titanic, some people row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise out of the water. Off from the back of Titanic, which is now tilted up several stories above the ocean surface, some passengers leap. Gripping Rose's hand, the crowd is leaped through by Jack. A railing is moved to by them and several passengers are watched as they plunge overboard. On they continue, pressing past a group of people kneeling around a priest. Near the propeller, a few dozen people tread water. Towards the deck, which is now slanted at a forty-five-degree angle, Jack pulls up. Onto the railing at the exact spot they first met, they grab. As they continue to tilt upward, water streams down the exposed propellers. One of the priest's hands is grabbed by kneeling people as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand. Beside Jack and Rose, a young boy is hugged to her chest by a woman. Shivering, Jack is clung to by Rose as she looks down at the sinking ship. In the cold air, her breath smokes. She smiles. Her forehead is kissed by Jack as he hugs her tight. Inside a submerged portion of the ship, beneath a large chandelier, a woman's lifeless body is drifted, her gauzy dress billowing in the water.

Her breath smokes in the cold air. Rose smiles. Jack hugs her tight and kisses her forehead. Inside a submerged ship portion, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a chandelier, her dress billowing in the water.

As water rises, some are carried up the staircase while others are trapped against the ceiling. The ornate wall clock at the top of the staircase sinks beneath the water. As seawater pours in, passengers back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest, Fabrizio swims past a broken window, slamming against the ship's side but braces himself. test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: They drop heavily onto the deck below with a resounding thud. Meanwhile, inside the ship, tables and chairs are violently tossed around, battering the swimming passengers caught in the chaos. As the water level rises steadily, some individuals are carried up the staircase by the force of the water, while others find themselves trapped against the ceiling of the room below, unable to escape. The ornately carved wall clock, which is positioned at the top of the grand staircase, slowly sinks beneath the churning, relentless water. As the sea water pours into the openings, passengers are forced to back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest for safety, Fabrizio swims past one of the broken windows, where the suction slams him against the side of the ship, but he manages to brace himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up desperately for a railing but slips in the process. Determined, he turns and swims toward the open water. Meanwhile, Rose drops onto a lower deck with a thud. The ship's baker, noticing her plight, helps her up. In the midst of the chaos, Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd, finding solace in each other's presence. In one of the lifeboats, Cal frantically beats off panicked passengers with an oar, trying to maintain control. Several cables holding a funnel snap and flail against the water like whips, creating a terrifying scene. Cal's eyes widen in horror as the huge funnel tips over. Swimming in the water with several others, Fabrizio looks up in shock as the giant funnel falls onto him. It's a massive wave that washes away several people in its path. A man attempts to climb into Cal's lifeboat, but Cal ruthlessly pushes him back into the ocean. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the dense crowd, which slowly funnels up another staircase. Inside, people desperately cling to columns at the top of the grand staircase, trying to hold on. Water surges up an empty corridor, splintering furniture and knocking doors off their hinges. Some people in a lifeboat behind the Titanic row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise ominously out of the water. Some passengers, in a desperate bid for survival, leap off from the back of the Titanic, which is now tilted up several stories above the ocean surface. Gripping Rose's hand tightly, Jack leaps through the crowd. They move to a railing and watch in horror as several passengers plunge overboard. Jack and Rose continue on, pressing past a group of people kneeling around a priest, seeking solace in prayer. A few dozen people tread water near the propeller, struggling to stay afloat. Jack pulls up towards the deck, which is now slanted at a precarious forty-five degree angle. They grab onto the railing at the exact spot where they first met, a poignant reminder of their journey. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward. Kneeling people grab one of the priest's hands as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand, seeking stability. Beside Jack and Rose, a woman hugs a young boy tightly to her chest, trying to protect him. Shivering from the cold, Rose clings to Jack as she looks down at the sinking ship, her breath visible in the frigid air. Despite the dire situation, Rose smiles, finding comfort in Jack's presence. Jack hugs her tightly and kisses her forehead tenderly. Inside a submerged portion of the ship, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier, her gauzy dress billowing eerily in the water.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: With a heavy, echoing thud, they drop with great force onto the deck below, creating a loud and resounding sound that reverberates through the ship. Meanwhile, inside the vessel, tables and chairs are violently thrown about, battering the unfortunate passengers who find themselves swimming amidst the chaos. As the water level continues to rise steadily and ominously, some individuals are lifted up the staircase by the relentless force of the water, while others become trapped against the room's ceiling below, unable to find an escape route. The ornately carved wall clock, elegantly positioned at the top of the grand staircase, slowly sinks beneath the churning and relentless onslaught of water. As the seawater pours ruthlessly into the openings, passengers are forced to retreat backward into the sinking ship. Donning a life vest for his own safety, Fabrizio swims past one of the shattered windows, where the powerful suction slams him against the ship's side, yet he manages to brace himself firmly against the windowed frame. He reaches desperately upward for a railing but slips during the attempt. Undeterred and determined, he turns resolutely and swims toward the open water. Meanwhile, Rose drops onto a lower deck with a startling thud. Spotting her predicament, the ship's baker comes to her aid and helps her to her feet. Amidst the pandemonium, Jack and Rose reunite in the heart of the crowd, finding solace and comfort in each other's presence. In one of the lifeboats, Cal frantically beats off panicked passengers with an oar, trying to maintain control of the situation. Several cables that hold a funnel snap and flail against the water like violent whips, creating a terrifying scene. Cal's eyes widen in terror as the enormous funnel tips over precariously. Swimming in the water among several others, Fabrizio looks up in shock and disbelief as the massive funnel crashes down upon him. A massive wave is unleashed, washing away numerous people in its powerful path. As a man attempts to climb into Cal's lifeboat, Cal ruthlessly pushes him back into the ocean's depths. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the dense and panicked crowd, which slowly funnels upward to another staircase. Inside, people desperately cling to columns at the top of the grand staircase, struggling to hold on. Water surges through an empty corridor, violently splintering furniture and knocking doors off their hinges. Some people in a lifeboat positioned behind the Titanic row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise ominously out of the water. With desperation, some passengers leap from the back of the Titanic, which is now tilted several stories above the ocean's surface, in a desperate bid for survival. Gripping Rose's hand with determination, Jack leaps through the crowd. They move to a nearby railing and watch in horror as several passengers plunge overboard into the cold water below. Jack and Rose press onward, moving past a group of people kneeling around a priest, who provides solace with prayer. A few dozen people tread water near the towering propeller, struggling to remain afloat in the icy water. Jack pulls up toward the deck, which now slants at a precarious forty-five-degree angle. They grab firmly onto the railing at the exact spot where they first met, serving as a poignant reminder of their journey together. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward into the night. Nearby, people kneeling grasp one of the priest's hands as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand, seeking much-needed stability. Beside Jack and Rose, a woman hugs a young boy tightly to her chest, trying to protect him from the chaos. Shivering from the biting cold, Rose clings to Jack as she peers down at the sinking ship, her breath visible in the frigid night air. Despite the dire and desperate situation, Rose smiles, finding comfort in the warmth of Jack's presence. Jack embraces her tightly and kisses her forehead tenderly. Inside a submerged section of the ship, a woman's lifeless body floats eerily beneath a large chandelier, her gauzy dress billowing hauntingly in the water.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: They drop onto the deck below, landing with a thud as they brace themselves against the hard surface. Meanwhile, inside the ship, tables and chairs are violently tossed around, battering the swimming passengers who struggle to maintain their balance. As the water level rises steadily, some passengers are buoyed up the staircase, their bodies carried by the force of the water, while others find themselves trapped against the ceiling of the room below, unable to escape. The ornately carved wall clock, which once stood proudly at the top of the staircase, slowly sinks beneath the churning water, disappearing from view. As seawater pours relentlessly into the openings, passengers are forced to back into the sinking ship, seeking any means of survival. Wearing a life vest, Fabrizio swims with determination past one of the broken windows, only to be suctioned against the side of the ship. He braces himself against the windowed frame, struggling to maintain his position. He reaches up for a railing, his fingers grasping for stability, but he slips, losing his grip. Undeterred, he turns and swims toward open water, seeking safety. Meanwhile, Rose drops onto a lower deck, landing with a jolt. The ship's baker, noticing her plight, quickly helps her up, offering a steadying hand. Amidst the chaos, Jack and Rose manage to reunite in the crowd, their relief palpable. In one of the lifeboats, Cal frantically beats off panicked passengers with an oar, trying to maintain control. Suddenly, several cables holding a funnel snap, flailing against the water like whips, creating a terrifying spectacle. Cal's eyes widen in horror as the huge funnel tips over, threatening everything in its path. Swimming in the water with several others, Fabrizio looks up just in time to see the giant funnel falling toward him, a wave of destruction that washes away several people. A man desperately climbs into Cal's lifeboat, seeking refuge, but Cal heartlessly pushes him back into the ocean, prioritizing his own safety. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the crowd, which slowly funnels up another staircase, their determination unwavering. Inside, people cling desperately to columns at the top of the grand staircase, their grip slipping as water surges up an empty corridor, splintering furniture and knocking doors off their hinges. Some people in a lifeboat behind the Titanic row furiously, their eyes fixed on the ship's enormous propellers rising ominously out of the water. As the Titanic tilts up several stories above the ocean surface, some passengers make the desperate decision to leap off from the back, plunging into the icy depths below. Gripping Rose's hand tightly, Jack leaps through the crowd, their movements synchronized as they navigate the chaos. They move to a railing, pausing to watch as several passengers plunge overboard, their fates uncertain. Jack and Rose continue on, pressing past a group of people kneeling around a priest, their prayers mingling with the sounds of the sinking ship. A few dozen people tread water near the propeller, their bodies bobbing in the frigid sea. Jack pulls up towards the deck, which is now slanted at a precarious forty-five-degree angle, their progress slow but determined. They grab onto the railing at the exact spot where they first met, a poignant reminder of their journey. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward, the ship's demise imminent. Kneeling people grab one of the priest's hands, seeking solace, as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand, his faith unwavering. Beside Jack and Rose, a woman hugs a young boy to her chest, her protective instincts taking over. Shivering in the cold, Rose clings to Jack, her eyes wide as she looks down at the sinking ship, her breath visible in the frigid air. Despite the dire situation, Rose manages a smile, a moment of warmth amidst the chaos. Jack hugs her tight, offering comfort, and kisses her forehead, a gesture of love and reassurance. Inside a submerged portion of the ship, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier, her gauzy dress billowing in the water, a haunting image of the tragedy unfolding.

test_cases.description: They drop onto the deck below. Inside the ship, tables and chairs batter swimming passengers as the water rises, carrying some up the staircase while trapping others against the ceiling. The ornately carved wall clock at the top of the staircase sinks beneath the churning water. As seawater pours in, passengers back into the sinking ship. Meanwhile, Rose drops onto a lower deck, where the ship's baker helps her up. Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd. In a lifeboat, Cal beats off panicked passengers with an oar. Several cables snap, causing a funnel to tip over. Fabrizio, swimming with others, looks up as the giant funnel falls onto him, creating a wave that washes away several people. In a lifeboat behind the Titanic, passengers row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise out of the water. Some passengers leap off the back of the Titanic, now tilted several stories above the ocean. Gripping Rose's hand, Jack leaps through the crowd to a railing, watching passengers plunge overboard. They press past a group kneeling around a priest. A few dozen people tread water near the propeller. Jack pulls up towards a deck slanted at a forty-five-degree angle, grabbing the railing where they first met. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they tilt upward. Kneeling people hold the priest's hand as he clings to a cab stand or rotating shaft. Beside Jack and Rose, a woman hugs a young boy. Shivering, Rose clings to Jack, looking down at the sinking ship, her breath smoking in the cold air. Rose smiles as Jack hugs her tight and kisses her forehead. Inside a submerged portion of the ship, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier, her gauzy dress billowing in the water.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: They drop onto the deck below, a precarious place made slippery by the ocean spray. Meanwhile, inside the ship, tables and chairs batter swimming passengers as if in a chaotic ballroom. The RMS Titanic, a luxury liner on its maiden voyage, starts surrendering to the icy Atlantic. As the water rises, some are carried up the grand staircase, a marvel of Edwardian craftsmanship, while others are trapped against the ornately decorated ceiling of the room below. The ornately carved wall clock at the top of the staircase, which was once a focal point for passengers checking the time en route to dinner, sinks beneath the churning water. As seawater pours into the openings, passengers back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest, Fabrizio, a fictional character representing the many hopeful immigrants aboard, swims past one of the broken windows and is slammed against the side of the ship by the force of the currents, but he braces himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up for a railing, once polished by the hands of eager travelers, but slips. He turns and swims toward open water in a bid for survival. Meanwhile, Rose drops onto a lower deck, one that served as a promenade for first-class passengers. The ship's baker, renowned later for surviving the sinking due to his high alcohol consumption, helps her up. Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd, a chaotic mix of desperation and hope. In one of the lifeboats, Cal beats off panicked passengers with an oar, the lifeboats being insufficient for all aboard. Several cables holding a funnel snap and flail against the water like whips. These funnels, designed to release smoke from the ship's massive boilers, now become terrifying hazards. Cal's eyes widen as the huge funnel tips over, a menacing shadow against the night sky. Swimming in the water with several others, Fabrizio looks up as the giant funnel falls onto him. It's a wave which washes away several people, a tragic end for many. A man climbs into Cal's lifeboat but Cal pushes him back into the ocean, a grim reflection of the survival instincts overtaking human decency. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the crowd which slowly funnels up another staircase, another grand architectural feat now a survival tunnel. Inside, people cling to columns at the top of the grand staircase, their last stand against the inevitable. Water surges up an empty corridor, splintering furniture and knocking doors off, the Titanic's once opulent decor reduced to debris. Some people in a lifeboat behind the Titanic row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise out of the water, a haunting sight against the moonlit sky. Some passengers leap off from the back of Titanic which is now tilted up several stories above the ocean surface, a leap of faith or despair. Gripping Rose's hand, Jack leaps through the crowd. They move to a railing and watch as several passengers plunge overboard, a solemn reminder of the ship's inadequate safety measures. Jack and Rose continue on, pressing past a group of people kneeling around a priest, likely Father Thomas Byles, who stayed onboard to offer solace. A few dozen people tread water near the propeller, their fate uncertain in the freezing temperatures. Jack pulls up towards deck which is now slanted at a forty-five degree angle, a testament to the ship's final moments. They grab onto the railing at the exact spot they first met, their love story echoing amidst the chaos. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward, the ship groaning under the strain. Kneeling people grab one of the priest's hands as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand, reciting prayers in the face of doom. Beside Jack and Rose, a woman hugs a young boy to her chest, embodying the countless personal tragedies of the night. Shivering, Rose clings to Jack as she looks down at the sinking ship, her breath smokes in the cold air, a visible sign of the freezing temperatures they endure. Rose smiles, their shared moment of calm amidst chaos. Jack hugs her tight and kisses her forehead, a fleeting moment of peace. Inside a submerged portion of the ship, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier, a stark reminder of the grandeur that once was, her gauzy dress billowing in the water like a ghostly shroud.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: They drop onto the deck below. Meanwhile inside the ship tables and chairs batter swimming passengers. As the water rises some are carried up the staircase while others are trapped against the ceiling of the room below. The ornately carved wall clock at the top of the staircase sinks beneath the churning water. As sea water pours into the openings passengers back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest Fabrizio swims past one of the broken window. suction slams against the side of the ship but he braces himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up for a railing but slips. He turns and swims toward open water. Meanwhile Rose drops onto a lower deck. The ship's baker helps her up. Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd. In one of the lifeboats Cal beats off panicked passengers with an oar. Several cables holding a funnel snap and flail against water like whips. Cal's eyes widen as the huge funnel tips over. Swimming in the water with several others. Fabrizio looks up as the giant funnel falls onto him. It is a wave which washes away several people. A man climbs into Cal's lifeboat but Cal pushes him back into the ocean. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the crowd which slowly funnels up another staircase. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. Inside people cling to columns at the top of the grand staircase. Water surges up an empty corridor splintering furniture and knocking doors off. Some people in a lifeboat behind the Titanic row furiously as the ship's enormous propellers rise out of the water. Some passengers leap off from the back of Titanic which is now tilted up several stories above the ocean surface. Gripping Rose's hand Jack leaps through the crowd. They move to a railing and watch as several passengers plunge overboard. Jack and Rose continue on pressing passed a group of people kneeling around a priest. A few dozen people tread water near the propeller. Jack pulls up towards deck which is now slanted at a fortyfive degree angle. They grab onto the railing at the exact spot they first met. Water streams down the exposed propellers as they continue to tilt upward. Kneeling people grab one of the priest's hands as he holds onto a cab stand or rotating shaft with his other hand. Beside Jack and Rose a woman hugs a young boy to her chest. Shivering Rose clings to Jack as she looks down at the sinking ship. Her breath smokes in the cold air. Rose smiles. Jack hugs her tight and kisses her forehead. Inside a submerged portion of the ship. a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a large chandelier. her gauzy dress billowing in the water.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: They drop onto the deck below. Meanwhile inside the ship tables and chairs batter swimming passengers. As the water rises some are carried up the staircase while others are trapped against the ceiling of the room below. The ornately carved wall clock at the top of the staircase sinks beneath the churning water. As sea water pours into the openings passengers back into the sinking ship. Wearing a life vest Fabrizio swims past one of the broken window. suction slams against the side of the ship but he braces himself against the windowed frame. He reaches up for a railing but slips. He turns and swims toward open water. Meanwhile Rose drops onto a lower deck. The ship's baker helps her up. Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd. In one of the lifeboats Cal beats off panicked passengers with an oar. Several cables holding a funnel snap and flail against water like whips. Cal's eyes widen as the huge funnel tips over. Swimming in the water with several others. Fabrizio looks up as the giant funnel falls onto him. It is a wave which washes away several people. A man climbs into Cal's lifeboat but Cal pushes him back into the ocean. Jack and Rose continue to fight their way through the crowd which slowly funnels up another staircase. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: They stumble onto the meadow below. Meanwhile, inside the castle, paintings and statues tickle flying dragons. As the wind howls, some are carried up the ladder while others are pinned against the ceiling of the cave below. The elegantly sculpted sundial at the top of the ladder floats above the swirling wind. As dust whirls into the gaps, dragons crawl away from the floating castle. Wearing a chainmail, Geronimo skates past one of the shattered mirrors and suction pulls against the side of the castle, but he anchors himself against the mirrored wall. He reaches up for a branch but stumbles. He turns and skates toward the open sky. Meanwhile, Lily stumbles onto an upper meadow. The castle's gardener lifts her up. Fred and Lily reconnect in the orchard. In one of the carriages, Max waves off distressed dragons with a stick. Several ropes holding a flag break and twirl against the wind like ribbons. Max's eyes widen as the enormous flag leans over. Gliding in the sky with several others, Geronimo looks up as the giant flag lands onto him. It's a gale which sweeps away several creatures. A troll clambers into Max's carriage, but Max shoves him back into the sky. Fred and Lily continue to weave their way through the orchard which slowly tunnels up another ladder. Inside, creatures cling to stalactites at the top of the majestic ladder. Wind rushes up an empty passage, splintering statues and flinging windows off. Some creatures in a carriage behind the Zephyr sail furiously as the castle's gigantic sails rise out of the wind. Some dragons leap off from the back of Zephyr which is now raised up several stories above the sky. Grasping Lily's paw, Fred jumps through the orchard. They drift to a branch and gaze as several creatures soar overboard. Fred and Lily continue on, squeezing past a group of creatures chanting around a bard. A few dozen creatures float near the sail. Fred climbs toward the meadow which is now tilted at a forty-five degree angle. They latch onto the branch at the exact spot they first greeted. Wind streams down the exposed sails as they keep swaying upward. Bowing creatures grasp one of the bard's paws as he clutches onto a lamppost or spinning crank with his other paw. Beside Fred and Lily, a fairy cuddles a tiny elf to her wings. Trembling, Lily grips Fred as she gazes down at the floating castle. Her breath mists in the cool breeze. Lily grins. Fred squeezes her gently and kisses her cheek. Inside a submerged section of the castle, a fairy's lifeless form drifts beneath a vast crystal, her gossamer wings fluttering in the breeze.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: They drop onto the deck below. Inside the ship, tables and chairs batter swimming passengers. As water rises, some are carried up the staircase, others trapped beneath the ceiling. The carved wall clock sinks beneath the water. Fabrizio, in a life vest, swims past a broken window and braces himself against the frame. He slips reaching for a railing, then swims toward open water. Rose drops to a lower deck, helped by the ship's baker. Jack and Rose reunite in the crowd. In a lifeboat, Cal fends off panicked passengers and watches as a funnel tips over. Fabrizio is crushed by the falling funnel, washed away by a wave. Cal pushes a man back into the ocean. Jack and Rose push through the crowd to another staircase. Water surges, splintering furniture. In a lifeboat, passengers row as Titanic's propellers rise out of the water. Some leap from the tilted stern. Jack and Rose reach a railing, watching passengers plunge overboard. They pass people kneeling around a priest. Jack pulls Rose up a slanted deck to where they first met. Water streams down exposed propellers. Clinging to each other, Rose shivers and smiles. Inside, a woman's lifeless body drifts beneath a chandelier. Jack hugs Rose and kisses her forehead as they brace against the ship's sinking.
